Hello world I'm Charly

Soy Carlos Alberto Chavarria Ortiz ingeniero en control y automatización que encontro su camino de vida, el gusto por la programación, tengo 23 años, soy un egresado con ganas de aprender mas y crecer para convertirme en un gran programador. Aquí en este espacio de información y centro de páctica comienza otra face para lograr mi objetivo.

Experiencia

Bootcamp - Generation México

I developed an E-commerce dedicated to anime products handcrafted with options to have a customized product.

  • I used Figma for mockups’ design.
  • I used HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript with responsive design and Bootstrap framework for screen programming.

I learned how to communicate during remote work, and I improved how to make decisions in a team.

Tesis de grado - IPN

I implemented research methodologies, and I elaborate documentation of components, programming, and the system operation. Structural programming for a control system of a packing machine of lipsticks. I designed and programmed Human - Machine Interfaces according to the standard ANSI.
